associatefilegateway.name: AssociateFileGateway
associatefilegateway.description: Grants permission to associate a File Gateway instance with an Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file system

associatefilesystemaliases.name: AssociateFileSystemAliases
associatefilesystemaliases.description: Grants permission to associate DNS aliases with an Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file system

bypasssnaplockenterpriseretention.name: BypassSnaplockEnterpriseRetention
bypasssnaplockenterpriseretention.description: Grants permission to allow deletion of an FSx for ONTAP SnapLock Enterprise volume that contains WORM (write once, read many) files with active retention periods

canceldatarepositorytask.name: CancelDataRepositoryTask
canceldatarepositorytask.description: Grants permission to cancel a data repository task

copybackup.name: CopyBackup
copybackup.description: Grants permission to copy a backup

copysnapshotandupdatevolume.name: CopySnapshotAndUpdateVolume
copysnapshotandupdatevolume.description: Grants permission to update an existing volume by using a snapshot from another Amazon FSx for OpenZFS file system

createbackup.name: CreateBackup
createbackup.description: Grants permission to create a new backup of an Amazon FSx file system or an Amazon FSx volume

createdatarepositoryassociation.name: CreateDataRepositoryAssociation
createdatarepositoryassociation.description: Grants permission to create a new data respository association for an Amazon FSx for Lustre file system

createdatarepositorytask.name: CreateDataRepositoryTask
createdatarepositorytask.description: Grants permission to create a new data respository task for an Amazon FSx for Lustre file system

createfilecache.name: CreateFileCache
createfilecache.description: Grants permission to create a new, empty, Amazon file cache

createfilesystem.name: CreateFileSystem
createfilesystem.description: Grants permission to create a new, empty, Amazon FSx file system

createfilesystemfrombackup.name: CreateFileSystemFromBackup
createfilesystemfrombackup.description: Grants permission to create a new Amazon FSx file system from an existing backup

createsnapshot.name: CreateSnapshot
createsnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a new snapshot on a volume

createstoragevirtualmachine.name: CreateStorageVirtualMachine
createstoragevirtualmachine.description: Grants permission to create a new storage virtual machine in an Amazon FSx for Ontap file system

createvolume.name: CreateVolume
createvolume.description: Grants permission to create a new volume

createvolumefrombackup.name: CreateVolumeFromBackup
createvolumefrombackup.description: Grants permission to create a new volume from backup

deletebackup.name: DeleteBackup
deletebackup.description: Grants permission to delete a backup, deleting its contents. After deletion, the backup no longer exists, and its data is no longer available

deletedatarepositoryassociation.name: DeleteDataRepositoryAssociation
deletedatarepositoryassociation.description: Grants permission to delete a data repository association

deletefilecache.name: DeleteFileCache
deletefilecache.description: Grants permission to delete a file cache, deleting its contents

deletefilesystem.name: DeleteFileSystem
deletefilesystem.description: Grants permission to delete a file system, deleting its contents and any existing automatic backups of the file system

deleteresourcepolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
deleteresourcepolicy.description: Required to manage cross-account sharing of FSx volumes through AWS Resource Access Manager (RAM). PutResourcePolicy and GetResourcePolicy are also required

deletesnapshot.name: DeleteSnapshot
deletesnapshot.description: Grants permission to delete a snapshot on a volume

deletestoragevirtualmachine.name: DeleteStorageVirtualMachine
deletestoragevirtualmachine.description: Grants permission to delete a storage virtual machine, deleting its contents

deletevolume.name: DeleteVolume
deletevolume.description: Grants permission to delete a volume, deleting its contents and any existing automatic backups of the volume

describeassociatedfilegateways.name: DescribeAssociatedFileGateways
describeassociatedfilegateways.description: Grants permission to describe the File Gateway instances associated with an Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file system

describebackups.name: DescribeBackups
describebackups.description: Grants permission to return the descriptions of all backups owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling

describedatarepositoryassociations.name: DescribeDataRepositoryAssociations
describedatarepositoryassociations.description: Grants permission to return the descriptions of all data repository associations owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling

describedatarepositorytasks.name: DescribeDataRepositoryTasks
describedatarepositorytasks.description: Grants permission to return the descriptions of all data repository tasks owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling

describefilecaches.name: DescribeFileCaches
describefilecaches.description: Grants permission to return the descriptions of all file caches owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling

describefilesystemaliases.name: DescribeFileSystemAliases
describefilesystemaliases.description: Grants permission to return the description of all DNS aliases owned by your Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file system

describefilesystems.name: DescribeFileSystems
describefilesystems.description: Grants permission to return the descriptions of all file systems owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling

describesharedvpcconfiguration.name: DescribeSharedVpcConfiguration
describesharedvpcconfiguration.description: Grants permission to return the descriptions of whether FSx route table updates from participant accounts are allowed in your account

describesnapshots.name: DescribeSnapshots
describesnapshots.description: Grants permission to return the descriptions of all snapshots owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint you're calling

describestoragevirtualmachines.name: DescribeStorageVirtualMachines
describestoragevirtualmachines.description: Grants permission to return the descriptions of all storage virtual machines owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling

describevolumes.name: DescribeVolumes
describevolumes.description: Grants permission to return the descriptions of all volumes owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling

disassociatefilegateway.name: DisassociateFileGateway
disassociatefilegateway.description: Grants permission to disassociate a File Gateway instance from an Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file system

disassociatefilesystemaliases.name: DisassociateFileSystemAliases
disassociatefilesystemaliases.description: Grants permission to disassociate file system aliases with an Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file system

getresourcepolicy.name: GetResourcePolicy
getresourcepolicy.description: Required to manage cross-account sharing of FSx volumes through AWS Resource Access Manager (RAM). PutResourcePolicy and DeleteResourcePolicy are also required

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for an Amazon FSx resource

managebackupprincipalassociations.name: ManageBackupPrincipalAssociations
managebackupprincipalassociations.description: Grants permission to manage backup principal associations through AWS Backup

putresourcepolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
putresourcepolicy.description: Required to manage cross-account sharing of FSx volumes through AWS Resource Access Manager (RAM). DeleteResourcePolicy and GetResourcePolicy are also required

releasefilesystemnfsv3locks.name: ReleaseFileSystemNfsV3Locks
releasefilesystemnfsv3locks.description: Grants permission to release file system NFS V3 locks

restorevolumefromsnapshot.name: RestoreVolumeFromSnapshot
restorevolumefromsnapshot.description: Grants permission to restore volume state from a snapshot

startmisconfiguredstaterecovery.name: StartMisconfiguredStateRecovery
startmisconfiguredstaterecovery.description: Grants permission to start misconfigured state recovery

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag an Amazon FSx resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from an Amazon FSx resource

updatedatarepositoryassociation.name: UpdateDataRepositoryAssociation
updatedatarepositoryassociation.description: Grants permission to update data repository association configuration

updatefilecache.name: UpdateFileCache
updatefilecache.description: Grants permission to update file cache configuration

updatefilesystem.name: UpdateFileSystem
updatefilesystem.description: Grants permission to update file system configuration

updatesharedvpcconfiguration.name: UpdateSharedVpcConfiguration
updatesharedvpcconfiguration.description: Grants permission to enable or disable FSx route table updates from participant accounts in your account

updatesnapshot.name: UpdateSnapshot
updatesnapshot.description: Grants permission to update snapshot configuration

updatestoragevirtualmachine.name: UpdateStorageVirtualMachine
updatestoragevirtualmachine.description: Grants permission to update storage virtual machine configuration

updatevolume.name: UpdateVolume
updatevolume.description: Grants permission to update volume configuration
